title: 3 and Out - Niners/Seahawks Game of the Week; Beast Mode Hype; Full Week 17 Preview; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Niners/Seahawks Game of the Week; Beast Mode Hype; Full Week 17 Preview; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff looks ahead to the Niners/Seahawks game of the week that will decide the NFC West, the hype surrounding Marshawn Lynch's return, and why this is Kyle Shanahan's moment to shine. He also previews the week 17 slate of games and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
